# About South Asia DHS Harmonization & Documentation Website

This is the Quarto website for documenting the harmonization, pooling, and preliminary analysis of Demographic and Health Survey (DHS) datasets from South Asian countries.

Visit the site: https://ronakpaulpc.github.io/sasiadhs-dhs-webdocs/

This work is part of my PhD research on **"Clustering and Risk Factors of Fetal Deaths and Early-life Mortality Across Families and Communities in South Asian Countries"** at the International Institute for Population Sciences, Mumbai.
